channel.title: Need some appeals
channel.description:
I got these bans :
29-May-2009 Manual Permanent Ban Ban Jagex N/A Appealable Appeal View 19-Jun-2007 Macroing Ban RuneScape N/A Re-Appealable Appeal None
the evidence for the first one is :
This account has been banned because of macroing. We do not discuss our detection processes. We have confirmed beyond doubt that this occurred via our detailed records of in-game activity. You have been deemed to have been in complete control at the time of the incident.
any one wanna give me some tips on how i should appeal them?

item.title: Need some appeals
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

[code]This account has been banned because of macroing.

We do not discuss our detection processes.

We have confirmed beyond doubt that this occurred via our detailed records of in-game activity.

You have been deemed to have been in complete control at the time of the incident.[/code]

At the point where it’s ‘beyond doubt’, you’re extremely unlikely to get unbanned for any reason. I’d say at this point your best bet is an apology and a claim that you will never do it again, though most likely you’ll have to start a new account.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some appeals
item.dc:creator: @g-stringer g-stringer
item.description:
@g-stringer wrote:

You can tell them whatever the fuck you want, you will not get unbanned. Most of time, if not always, appeals for macroing get auto denied.

Read full topic
